QuestData.Title: Gunship Down
QuestData.Description: The Archstone was being transported inside a flying Horde gunship called the Storm's Fury.$B$BThe airship crashed south of here and our scrying has revealed the Archstone's no longer on it.$B$BSearch the ship for clues related to what might've happened.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for clues at the Storm's Fury Wreckage in Deepholm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find out what happened to the Storm's Fury?
QuestData.RewardText: The clues point to an obvious conclusion. Too obvious perhaps.
